roleset.name: catching air as if in a trap

role.descr: Type of air trapped, if explicit
Location air is being trapped in (might be a medical patient)

example.name: airtrapping-n: arg2 medical patient
example.text: High-resolution CT scan of the thorax obtained during inspiration demonstrates airtrapping in a patient with asthma.

roleset.note: AIRTRAPPING-N NOTES: Relation to verb-trap.01. (from airtrapping.01-n)
